client installation.eli5: Client Installation is like a setting or tool that helps computers talk to each other safely or helps IT teams take care of lots of computers at once.
client installation.boss: Client Installation includes WireGuard config elements, zero-trust VPN alternatives, and Microsoft Configuration Manager (SCCM/MECM) components used for secure communication and centralized endpoint management.
client installation.sysadmin: Client Installation refers to a WireGuard attribute, IAP-based access method, or ConfigMgr component used to establish secure tunnels, perform client discovery, deploy software, or manage Windows environments in hybrid and cloud-native networks.
client installation.use_case: An IT administrator uses Client Installation to configure WireGuard tunnels, control remote client behavior, or manage endpoints in a Microsoft enterprise environment.
